_comment: Synthetic camera calibration for Rugby Vision demo
_description: This file contains calibration parameters for 3 cameras positioned around a rugby field. These are synthetic values for demonstration purposes.

cam_0.description: Main camera - positioned at midfield touchline, elevated 10m, looking across field

cam_1.description: Left camera - positioned at corner, elevated 12m, angled view

cam_2.description: Right camera - positioned at opposite corner, elevated 12m

field_reference.description: World coordinate system is aligned with rugby field
field_reference.origin: Corner of try line (left corner when viewing from center)
